short_description.message: Multiple versions of the plan to get to the right decisions.

description.message:
Account Scenario Planning supports the customer business planning process by supporting multiple scenarios for an account and year by varying price conditions, volumes, contracts, promotions and spends. **Base Plan** - Installs metadata configurations that help you get your org up and running. Recommended for all customers. **Post Install Steps**:
1. Follow the [document](https://salesforce.quip.com/o3XZAx1WJpA3) to manually enable ASP for your Sales Org. **IMPORTANT**: Salesforce does not recommend installing directly in production organizations. Instead, install in one of your free sandbox environments, or a developer organization first.
